body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals               Animals                   Amphibians               Bats               Birds               Butterflies               Reptiles             The animal community at Weir Farm National Historic Site consists of white-tailed deer, squirrels, woodchuck, cotton-tail rabbit, turkey, fox, turtles, frogs, salamanders, panfish in the pond, and a variety of songbirds.
title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Animals
